posts.content:
For sale, `61 RHD single cab, Oz import nearly 10 years ago, was painted then and still looks good, although cannot be described as a mint show truck.

Rebuilt Cogbox with nicer ratios, big nut RGB`s, new brakes all round 2 years ago with dual curcuit master, engine bought as a 1776, though never stripped down, that runs nice with twin Kads. Stainless Bluebird exhaust with heat exchangers, new heater cables, clutch, throttle and handbrake cables too. Hoops and new oak slats, with non original canvas (bit scruffy but fits). Banjo steering wheel, safari`s front and rear, as new 640x15 Firestone crossplies on nicely painted rims plus a set of radials on rims, grey painted hubcaps, `vw` mudflaps all round, nice interior with rubber mat and overcarpet. Roofrack with new oak slats.

MOT`d and taxed till Sept 2010.

All in all a nice usable truck, with as far as I can tell all original panels, and no bodgy welding, that could benefit from some extra tlc if you wanted to `mint it`.

Comes with some spares, including half load bed floor (VW), inner sills, original 1200 engine, early RGB`s and shafts.

Only for sale due to temporary change of direction, may p/ex for RHD notch in good condition (£4k?) plus cash.

£10,750

£9750 without a heap of parts.

PM me if interested, truck on the Isle of Wight.













Winter storage

not sure what i like the most, your workshop/garage or your truck !!!!

shalom, Lee
The `Ford` themed garage is not mine, just where I had it stored over the winter. Mine gets a bit damp.

Great truck!!
Is that an rs500 you have there on the bottom left of the picture??

paneldave wrote:
Great truck!!
Is that an rs500 you have there on the bottom left of the picture??


Bloody hell, that was a good spot!

Actually it is a replica with a 4.9 Rover and NOS, belongs to my mate that let me park my truck there over the winter.

Good lookin SC, what the ratios on the cogbox?
Cheers

Now I gotta think!

I asked for the higher ratio diff (3.8 ?), he put in a later 1st gear and welded 3rd and 4th I think. New nosecone, hockey stick and uprated clutch arm.

Also has Kennedy pressure plate.

Loads of other stuff replaced/renewed like door handles, rubbers etc.

thats lovely..














.


wish mine would sell

ha ha hawkeyes they call me!! Eyes like a $hit house rat...
Up for another week.

I blame the other 'camper' you bought! And you told me I couldnt sell mine!

Reeally nice truck, bargain!!
There`s a lot of things in the pipe at the moment, don`t really want to sell but the money would go a long way towards some projects I have going on.

Know exactly how you feel mate! Shouldnt take long its a great truck.

Featured in a book too peeps, will scan the pages in and post up if you want?
